item.title: Materialia Lumina: Contemporary Artists' Books from the Codex International Book Fair at Green Library, Bing Wing
item.description:
Stanford Libraries presents Materialia Lumina: Contemporary Artists' Books from the Codex International Book Fair, on view February 24, 2022, through August 28, 2022, in the Peterson Gallery and Munger Rotunda, Cecil H. Green Library Bing Wing, 2nd Floor.

The exhibition Materialia Lumina is curated by Robert Trujillo; produced, designed, and installed by Deardra Fuzzell. 

NOTE: Exhibit cases in the Peterson Gallery and Munger Rotunda are illuminated from 9 a.m. to 5 p.m. Visitors are encouraged to call 650-723-0931 or visit the Library Hours page to confirm hours and access.

The exhibition is free and currently restricted to the following current Stanford ID cardholders: students, post-docs, professors (including emeriti), academic staff, fellows, and Stanford visiting scholars. Learn about the Libraries' entry requirements and available services.
